title: Create calculator package with Add function
description:
Create internal/calculator/calc.go with package calculator and an Add(a, b int) int function that returns the sum.

Requirements:
- Package name: calculator
- Function: Add(a, b int) int
- Should include a package-level doc comment

Run: go build ./internal/calculator/...
closed_reason: Created internal/calculator/calc.go with package-level doc comment and Add(a, b int) int function. Build verified successfully.
